Subject: XP Universe - XP Adoption Panel Discussion - Program Change
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="us-ascii"; format=flowed
From: Paul Hodgetts <prh@...>

For anyone who is going to XP Universe this coming week...

There is a slight program change to the session on Tuesday morning,
8:30 to 10:00 AM, entitled "eXtreme Adoption eXperiences of a B2B
Start Up."

We are opening up the topic of this discussion to include any XP
adoption experiences, not just those of B2B start ups, or Escrow.com
in particular.  We believe this will make the session more generally
interesting to a larger group of the attendees.

Along with the topic change, we have opened up the panel to include
other folks from the industry with XP adoption experience, in
addition to the original panelists from Escrow.com.  We believe this
will provide the session attendees with access to a wider range of
opinions and experiences.

We'd love to have you attend.  We believe there will be some great
discussions of the challenges and successes of adopting XP.  If
you're considering adopting XP, you can pick up some tips from folks
who have been through it.  If you've adopted XP, it's a chance to
share your experiences as well as compare your experiences to others.

If you're interested in participating as a panelist, please contact
me directly.

-Paul Hodgetts
prh@...
subject: XP Universe - XP Adoption Panel Discussion - Program Change
